body:
This PR is an attempt to address some of the many Mercurial-related bugs that keep popping up.

### Features

1. Adds `--insecure` fetching support for Mercurial downloads
   * Fixes #3590 
2. Adds dependency on `py-certifi` for CA certificate
   * Replaces the logic from #1873 which only worked on Linux
   * Fixes #3847
3. Unsets `PYTHONPATH` when running `hg`
   * Fixes #1645 
   * Fixes #2811
   * Fixes #3591 
   * Fixes #3793 
   * Fixes #3831 
4. Adds the latest version of mercurial and all of its dependencies
5. Adds post-installation tests to mercurial and all of its dependencies
6. Installs man pages
7. Installs tab-completion scripts

The only Mercurial-related problem I haven't been able to solve is #2816, but no one seems to be able to reproduce it.
title: Rework Spack's Mercurial support
